mapper.sql: fb.ID, fb.FIX_BORROW_ID, fb.ACCOUNT, fb.USE_MONEY, fb.AWARDS, fb.ACCOUNT_REAL, fb.ACCOUNT_YES, fb.FIX_LOCK_LIMIT, fb.FIX_LOCK_STYLE, fb.FIX_LOCK_ENDTIME, fb.FIX_APR, fb.FIX_BORROW_NAME, fb.FIX_CONTRACT_NO, fb.BID_PASSWORD, fb.ADDTIME, fb.ADDUSER, fb.LAST_UPDATE_TIME, fb.LAST_UPDATE_USER, fb.SUCCESS_TIME, fb.`STATUS`, fb.REMARK, fb.PLATFORM
mapper.insert: insert into t_fix_borrow_transfer (FIX_BORROW_ID, ACCOUNT, USE_MONEY, AWARDS, ACCOUNT_REAL, ACCOUNT_YES, FIX_LOCK_LIMIT, FIX_LOCK_STYLE, FIX_LOCK_ENDTIME, FIX_APR, FIX_BORROW_NAME, FIX_CONTRACT_NO, BID_PASSWORD, ADDTIME, ADDUSER, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_USER, SUCCESS_TIME, STATUS, REMARK, PLATFORM) values ( #{fixBorrowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{account,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{useMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{awards,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{accountReal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{accountYes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fixLockLimit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{fixLockStyle,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{fixLockEndtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{fixApr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fixBorrowName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixContractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bidPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{adduser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{successTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platform,jdbcType=BIT})

mapper.update:
update t_fix_borrow_transfer
FIX_BORROW_ID = #{fixBorrowId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USE_MONEY = #{useMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AWARDS = #{awards,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACCOUNT_REAL = #{accountReal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACCOUNT_YES = #{accountYes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FIX_LOCK_LIMIT = #{fixLockLimit,jdbcType=TINYINT},
FIX_LOCK_STYLE = #{fixLockStyle,jdbcType=TINYINT},
FIX_LOCK_ENDTIME = #{fixLockEndtime,jdbcType=DATE},
FIX_APR = #{fixApr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FIX_BORROW_NAME = #{fixBorrowName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIX_CONTRACT_NO = #{fixContractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BID_PASSWORD = #{bidPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDTIME = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ADDUSER = #{adduser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATE_USER = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SUCCESS_TIME = #{successTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLATFORM = #{platform,jdbcType=BIT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_fix_borrow_transfer set FIX_BORROW_ID = #{fixBorrowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USE_MONEY = #{useMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AWARDS = #{awards,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACCOUNT_REAL = #{accountReal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACCOUNT_YES = #{accountYes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIX_LOCK_LIMIT = #{fixLockLimit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, FIX_LOCK_STYLE = #{fixLockStyle,jdbcType=TINYINT}, FIX_LOCK_ENDTIME = #{fixLockEndtime,jdbcType=DATE}, FIX_APR = #{fixApr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIX_BORROW_NAME = #{fixBorrowName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIX_CONTRACT_NO = #{fixContractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BID_PASSWORD = #{bidPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDTIME = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ADDUSER = #{adduser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_USER = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SUCCESS_TIME = #{successTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATFORM = #{platform,jdbcType=BIT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(1) from t_fix_borrow_transfer where status = 1
select ID,FIX_BORROW_ID,FIX_CONTRACT_NO , ACCOUNT_REAL, FIX_LOCK_LIMIT, (ACCOUNT_REAL - ACCOUNT_yes) as dzcMoney,USE_MONEY from t_fix_borrow_transfer where status = 1 order by fix_lock_endtime ASC

SELECT
FROM t_fix_borrow_transfer fb WHERE fb.`STATUS` = 1 and fb.id = #{id} ORDER BY fb.ACCOUNT ASC,fb.FIX_LOCK_LIMIT ASC

SELECT
FROM t_fix_borrow_transfer fb WHERE fb.ID = #{id} FOR UPDATE
select fbt.ID,fbt.FIX_BORROW_ID from t_fix_borrow_transfer fbt INNER JOIN t_fix_tender_transfer ftt on fbt.ID=ftt.FIX_BORROW_TRANSFER_ID where ftt.BORROW_ID=#{borrowId} and fbt.`STATUS`=1
